content: **knitted hat / hipster hat in drops flora and drops kid-silk piece is knitted bottom up in stocking stitch with double folding edge ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fl-078 yarn group a + a or c ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** m/l -x/l head circumference approx 56/58 - 58/60 cm height with fold = 25-26 cm **materials** drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-100 g colour 01 off white and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-50 g colour 44 moonshine needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm **knitting gauge ** 19 stitches in width and 25 row vertically in stocking stitch with 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
